relation: Campus polices are always helpful and willing to help.
Different clubs and Organizations: Pow Wow Leadership Society Student Government Association Trio( Student Support Services) Elated Voices Phi Theta Kappa
Faulkner plan a day when they took us to the beach. Being in the different clubs was fun.

I really enjoy staying in the dorms on campus. I was a RA for one of the residence halls and I really enjoyed it . The first week being there, I meet so many new faces. Everyone was so friendly and very helpful.
Academic is very important because Faulkner wants to see everyone succeed in life. The faculty and staff is always encouraging you to do your best in everything.

You are going to really enjoy Faulkner. When you become active in different clubs and organizations, you are going to become a family. We all came there as strangers to one another but left as a family.
I absolutely love Faulkner. The Faculty and staff is very helpful and caring. I highly recommend this school to anyone.
pageTitle: James H Faulkner State Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

The pictures I have seen of campus are beautiful, they offer my major of choice online, and so much more that benefits me greatly. I recommend this college to everybody! I look forward to learning more about Faulkner and potentially attending it in the Fall 2015 semester!, 6385=I enjoy the teachers I have here. textAfterTable: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus I am not sure because I commute. Bang for the buck Study and make sure you are attentive in class. Get to know your teachers! It really does make a difference. Like I said earlier, I loved mine and know that they are there to help me. What to do for fun From what I can see, the beach is about 20 to 30 minutes away, they have a bowling alley and skating rink and just about everything is on one street. There are bigger cities nearby like Mobile and Daphne. Food and Dining The day I went it was really good. But since I commute to school, I don't have a meal plan. The price to eat is about $7.00 but you can eat buffet style. Dorm Life I commute. But I hear the new dormitory is really nice. Academic Rigor Wonderful teachers! Make sure you ask questions if you don't understand. Write them down while the teacher is teaching so you don't interrupt them (just a polite way of making sure
